Offer: AU Bank: Flat Rs.10,000 Instant Discount* on Credit Card Non EMI Txn
Terms and Conditions:
Offer Details:

Offer on AU Credit Card Non-EMI transactions:

Flat Rs 1,000 discount on purchase of Rs 15,000 & above
Flat Rs 2,000 discount on purchase of Rs 50,000 & above
Flat Rs 5,000 discount on purchase of Rs 1,00,000 & above
Flat Rs 10,000 discount on purchase of Rs 2,00,000 & above


Maximum Discount: Rs. 10,000/-
Minimum Spends: Rs. 15,000/-
Offer Validity: 01st Oct?25 to 31st Dec?25
Offer Days: Offer will be valid every week on Monday (excluding Tactical Campaign days)
Velocity: Applicable once per card per month during offer period


Offer Terms & Conditions:

This marketing program (?Program?) is from AU Bank under an arrangement with Infiniti Retail Ltd., (?Merchant?) and is open to all residents of India holding a valid and current AU Credit Card (?Cardholder?)


Non-EMI Transactions- For purchase of Rs. 15,000 & above with the card during the campaign period, AU Credit cardholders can avail the above offers as same day Instant Discount on qualifying transaction on croma.com

 


The program is valid from 01st Oct ?25 till 31st Dec ?25 on every Monday only unless extended by the Parties and Merchant.
Offer applicable only on one transaction per card per month. For Credit Card, customer can avail offer on full swipe once in a month on a single card.
Eligible bank customer has to select the bank offer on the payment page to avail the offer.
The offer is applicable on AU Bank select card BIN numbers provided by the bank.
Non ?eligible bank customer will receive appropriate error messages and can proceed without the Instant Discount.
Instant Discount will not be extended for the customer if he/she fails to select the bank offer.
Program is applicable only on transactions done on campaign period & will not be applicable on any other day.
Instant Discount will not be applicable on advance invoice.
Maximum 1 transaction on a card will be eligible, any further transaction using same card will not get the benefit of the offer. Only 1 card per invoice is eligible for Instant Discount.
Bank Card Account is required to be active and non-delinquent. Returned transactions, disputed or unauthorized/fraudulent transactions will not be considered for this offer.
All the existing offers, gifts, discounts etc., that are being offered can be availed by the Cardholders apart of this exclusive offer as mentioned in the communication.
No two offers can be clubbed together or can be exchanged in cash/ part or whole.
Under no circumstance will the offer/discount being offered under this Program be settled with cash in lieu by AU Bank or by Merchant
Any disputes arising out of the Offer shall be subject to arbitration by a sole arbitrator appointed by AU Bank for this purpose. The proceedings of the arbitration shall be conducted as per the provisions of Arbitration and Conciliation Act, 1996. The place of arbitration shall be at Mumbai and language of arbitration shall be English. The existence of a dispute, if any, shall not constitute a claim against AU Bank.
The Program is for the consumption of individual retail consumers only Infiniti Retail & AU Bank reserve right to modify or end the offer during the campaign period
Croma is a participating entity as per the commercial between AU Small Fice Bank Ltd and Infiniti Retail Ltd.
The offers are brought to you by AU Small Fice Bank ("AU Small Fice Bank") and any participation in the offer is voluntary.
Cardholders are required to use their AU Credit to pay for the services/product under the offers to avail the discounts.
Regular Credit Card Terms and Conditions apply.
The offers are on-going till the specified validity date.
The offers are applicable on select brands & categories and are at the discretion of IRL & Bank.
Offers made by the participating establishments may not be used in combination with any other offer that is in force. The offers are subject to force majeure events
Taxes additional as applicable, Tax liability, if any, will be borne by the Cardholder.
Bank reserves the right to withdraw or alter any of the terms and conditions of the offer at any time without prior notice.
Bank is neither responsible for nor guarantees the product/services of participating establishments.
Bank shall not be liable for any defects or deficiency of the product or service so obtained/availed of by the Cardholder
Bank shall not be liable for any loss or damage whatsoever that may be suffered, or for any personal injury that may be suffered as a result of availing of the offer.
This offer will not be clubbed with any existing offers on the website or application
The offers cannot be redeemed for cash or clubbed with any other offer or promotion
Not applicable on kits and sample products
Bank & IRL reserves to right to run the above agreed offer / increase / decrease the customer gratification on select categories, brands & products.
 

Customer agrees to merchant/partner product/service disclaimer and terms and conditions as stated- https://www.croma.com/terms-of-use

Offer: BOBCARD: Flat Rs.2500 Instant Discount* on Credit Card Non EMI Txn. Flat Rs.300 Instant discount* on Credit Card EMI Txn
Terms and Conditions:
Offer Details:

This marketing program (?Program?) is from BOBCARD under an arrangement with Infiniti Retail Ltd., (?Merchant?) and is open to all residents of India holding a valid and current BOB Credit Card (?Cardholder?)
The Validity of the Program (?Term?) is for 1st Oct ?25 to 31st Dect?25, unless extended by the Parties and Merchant.
 

Offer Period: 1st Oct ?25 to 31st Dect?25.

Proposed Offer Construct for Online (www.croma.com):

A) For Full Swipe: 10% instant discount up to Rs 1,500 on min purchase of Rs. 10,000/-

For EMI: 10% instant discount up to Rs. 2,000 on min purchase of Rs. 10,000/- (for EMI tenures of 6 months & above)

Minimum Transaction Value: Rs. 10,000/-

 

B)For Full Swipe: Flat Rs 2,500 instant discount on min purchase of Rs. 50,000/- and above

For EMI: Flat Rs. 3,000 instant discount on min purchase of Rs. 50,000/-  (for EMI tenures of 6 months & above)

 

Minimum Transaction Value: Rs. 50,000/-

 

Offer Terms & Conditions:

Eligible bank customer has to select the bank offer on the payment page to avail the offer
Non ? eligible bank customer will receive appropriate error messages and can proceed without the instant Discount
Instant Discount will not be extended for the customer if he/she fails to select the bank offer.
Maximum Instant Discount under the offer will be Rs. 3,000 at a card level
Program is applicable only on transactions done on campaign period & will not be applicable on any other day
Instant Discount will not be applicable on advance invoice
Maximum 1 transaction per month per card will be eligible, any further transaction using same card will not get the benefit of the offer.
Any query regarding the program will be entertained till 31st Jan?26. Post such date; BOBCARD will not entertain any correspondence or communication regarding this Program from any cardholder.
The offers are applicable on select brands & categories and are at the discretion of Infiniti Retail Limited (Croma) & BOBCARD.
Bank Card Account is required to be active and non-delinquent. Returned transactions, disputed or unauthorized/fraudulent transactions will not be considered for this offer.
All the existing offers, gifts, discounts etc., that are being offered can be availed by the Cardholders apart of this exclusive offer as mentioned in the communication.
Under no circumstance will the offer/discount being offered under this Program be settled with cash in lieu by BOBCARD or by Merchant.
Any disputes arising out of the Offer shall be subject to arbitration by a sole arbitrator appointed by BOB for this purpose. The proceedings of the arbitration shall be conducted as per the provisions of Arbitration and Conciliation Act, 1996. The place of arbitration shall be at Mumbai and language of arbitration shall be English. The existence of a dispute, if any, shall not constitute a claim against BOBCARD.
The Program is for the consumption of individual retail consumers only Infiniti Retail & BOB reserve right to modify or end the offer during the campaign period.
IRL & BOBCARD reserves to right to run the above agreed offer / increase / decrease the customer gratification on select categories, brands & products.
The decision of Infiniti Retail Limited (Croma) and BOBCARD will be final and binding and any correspondence in this regard will not be entertained.
Note: Croma is a participating entity as per the commercial between BOB and Infiniti Retail Ltd.

?       Offer will not be applicable on Business, Commercial & Corporate ICICI Bank Credit Cards.

?       Offer will not be applicable on ICICI Bank Amazon Pay credit card.

?       Program is applicable only on transactions done on campaign days & will not be applicable on any other day of the week.

?       ICICI Bank cardholder can avail the offer only on the first valid transaction during each month of the offer period. Subsequent transactions in the month will not be applicable for the offer.

?       Offer applicable only for the first valid transaction in each month, which is fulfilling all conditions including Net transaction value, as mentioned in the offer details.

?       Net transaction value shall mean the retail price of the products purchased less discount offered to the cardholders at the Croma retail outlets or Croma.com website.

?       The instant discount is applicable on a single transaction and bills cannot be clubbed to avail the same.

?       Bank Card Account is required to be active and non-delinquent. Returned transactions, disputed or unauthorized/fraudulent transactions will not be considered for this offer.

Terms and Conditions:
Offer Construct:

7.5% Instant Discount Up to Rs. 3,000 with HDFC Easy EMI on CC.
 Offer Period: Every Friday, Saturday & Sunday starting 1th Oct  2025 till 31st Dec  2025.
 Minimum txn on www.croma.com : Rs. 10,000/-
 Offer cannot be clubbed with Brand EMI offer or any other Offer
Valid tenure - 6 months & Above
 Discount applicable once per Card per week.
 Offer applicable on Retail Credit Cards, Business and select Corporate and Commercial Credit Cards.
Terms & Conditions:

 HDFC Bank holds out no warranty or makes no representation about the quality, delivery or otherwise of the services offered by the partner. Any dispute or claim regarding the services/offers must be resolved by the Card Holder/s with the partner directly without any reference to HDFC Bank.
 HDFC Bank shall not be liable in any manner whatsoever for any loss/ damage/ claim that may arise out of use or otherwise of any goods/ services / assured gifts / gift vouchers availed by the Card Holder/s under the said Offer offered by the partner
 HDFC Bank shall not be held liable for any delay or loss that may be caused in delivery of the services.
 This Offer is made available to the Customers selected at the discretion of HDFC Bank.
 The offer cannot be combined with any other offer
 If promo code is mentioned as part of the communication (please refer Offer details tab) then customer has to use the code to avail the offer; in case the code is not used Discount/ Cashback cannot be credited back to customer at a later date.
 Any person availing this offer shall be deemed to have accepted these Terms and Conditions.
 HDFC Bank reserves the right, at any time, without prior notice and without assigning any reason whatsoever, to add/alter/modify/change or vary all these terms and conditions or to replace, wholly or in part, this offers by another offer, whether like this offer or not, or to extend or withdraw it altogether.
 Eligible benefits for this promotion (such as Reward points / cashback) will only be posted to accounts that are active at the time of postings. 
 Benefits will not be posted on credit card accounts which are permanently delinquent or closed at the time of posting.
 Benefits will also not be posted on retail credit card accounts that are flagged for working capital usage.
 HDFC Bank Cardholders are not bound in any way to participate in this offer. Any participation is voluntary, and the offer is being made purely on a best effort basis.
 Nothing herein amounts to a commitment by HDFC Bank to conduct further, similar, or other offers.
 This offer is not applicable on virtual cards, Consumer Durable, VPA, Fleet, R&R Commercial, Purchase cards, Intermiles, Paytm, Equitas, Swiggy, Flipkart Wholesale, Pine Labs, Emirates, Harley, IBIBO and IRCTC Cards.
 This offer is non-cashable, not extendable, and non-negotiable.
 Purchases eligible for Instant Discount/ Cashback on HDFC Bank Credit Card will not qualify for Reward Points. The same will be reversed within 120 days.
 If a card member has more than 1 (one) HDFC Bank Credit/Debit Card, spends on the cards cannot be clubbed by the card member to qualify for the said offer.
 The above offer is by way of a special offer co-funded by the Bank & Merchant for select HDFC Bank Credit/Debit Cardholders only and nothing contained herein shall prejudice or affect the terms and conditions of the card member agreement. The terms of the above schemes shall be in addition to and not in derogation of the terms contained in the card member agreement.
 All disputes, if any, arising out of or in connection with or because of above offers or otherwise relating hereto shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the competent courts / tribunals in Mumbai only, irrespective of whether courts / tribunals in other areas have concurrent or similar jurisdiction.
 Any query regarding the program will be entertained till 60 days from the posting date. After said date the Bank will not entertain any correspondence or communication regarding this Program from the cardholder.
Any Tax, service charge or other charges levied with regards to the Promotional Offer, may be borne by the Card Holder / winner.
The offers are applicable on select brands, categories & products and are at the discretion of Infiniti Retail Limited (Croma) & HDFC Bank.
Infiniti Retail Limited (Croma) and HDFC Bank have the right to change or discontinue the offer at any time during the promotion period.
The Program is for the consumption of individual retail consumers only Infiniti Retail & HDFC Bank reserve right to modify or end the offer during the campaign period.
The decision of Infiniti Retail Limited (Croma) and HDFC Bank will be final and binding and any correspondence in this regard will not be entertained.
